location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of the North-Eastern Part of the Arabian Peninsula

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink and crayon on paper.Dimensions: 328 x 202mm.

mods.abstract: This sketch map shows the north-eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula, indicating boundaries, settlements and wadis(ravines or valleys which become watercourses during the rainy season). Scale not given.
